Package com.github.mikephil.charting.components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AxisBase
    Base-class of all axes (previously called labels).
    ComponentBase
    This class encapsulates everything both Axis, Legend and LimitLines have in common.
    Legend
    Class representing the legend of the chart.
    LimitLine
    The limit line is an additional feature for all Line-, Bar- and ScatterCharts.
    MarkerView
    View that can be displayed when selecting values in the chart.
    XAxis
    Class representing the xPx-axis labels settings.
    YAxis
    Class representing the yPx-axis labels settings and its entries.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Legend.LegendDirection  
    Legend.LegendForm  
    Legend.LegendPosition  
    LimitLine.LimitLabelPosition
    enum that indicates the position of the LimitLine label
    XAxis.XAxisPosition
    enum for the position of the xPx-labels relative to the chart
    YAxis.AxisDependency
    Enum that specifies the axis a DataSet should be plotted against, either LEFT or RIGHT.
    YAxis.YAxisLabelPosition
    enum for the position of the yPx-labels relative to the chart
